name: Zenith
description: Premium mod menu with Auto-Safe Mode, Noclip, Speedhack, and TPS Bypass.

auto-safe-mode.name: Auto Safe Mode
auto-safe-mode.description: Disables cheats on rated levels to prevent leaderboard bans.

speedhack.name: Speedhack
speedhack.description: Adjust game speed (0.5 = slow, 1.0 = normal, 1.5 = fast).

tps-bypass.name: TPS Bypass (240)
tps-bypass.description: Forces 240 ticks per second for smoother physics.
